name: Who Killed Laura
description:
Vaporwave maze tribute to Twin Peaks and the 80's game æsthetics.
Made for VaporJam.

Credits

axoona - graphics, coding in Skratch, sound design
LisaBanana - game design, writing
MarvinZ - music

few notes from Main Twin Peaks Theme
midi game tracks (Lotus III Ultimate Challange, Indiana Jones, Prince of Persia) from abandonia.com
sounds from freesound.org by Benboncan, majod, ristooooo1.
pictures from unsplash.com.

Main track "Enterre-moi mon amour" is a vaporwave remix of a music track we recorded for our TTRPG Vampire Mascarade campaign (and which was based on Violenza Domestica by Mr Bungle).
